word: A NUMBER OF ENLIGHTENING STATEMENTS APPEAR IN THE YOUTH'S INSTRUCTOR. EXCERPTS FROM MANY OF THESE AND FROM LIKE MATERIALS FROM OTHER SOURCES HAVE ALREADY APPEARED IN SELECTED MESSAGES, BOOK 1, PAGES 242-289; THE 1965 DEVOTIONAL BOOK, "THAT I MAY KNOW HIM"; AND ELLEN G. WHITE RELEASES IN THE SDA BIBLE COMMENTARY, VOLUME 5, PAGE 1126-1131; AND VOLUME 7A, PAGES 443-456, THE LATTER BEING A REPRINT OF APPENDIX B OF SEVENTH-DAY ADVENTISTS ANSWER QUESTIONS ON DOCTRINE.
